name: Dark Influence
description:
Play as a demon sent to enslave the human race. Unknown to you, the only true way to "enslave" humans nowadays is to gain followers and get likes on Twitter Chirpr! Gain enough followers to become a Dark Influencer.

Composer/Sound Designers:

Dayna Ambrosio: @DaynaAmbrosio

Remi Chandler:  @CandleKing10
